game.title: Ancient Ruins Quest
game.objective: Discover the hidden treasure in the ruins
game.description: Travel to the old temple, find the key and unlock the chamber.

task.objective: Visit the village elder for clues
task.description: The elder will direct you to the ruins.
Follow the markings on the stones to locate the entrance.

task.objective: Unlock the chamber with the key
task.description: The treasure is inside, protected by a puzzle.
